title: Phytoextracts as Natural Anti-Aging Agents: Mechanisms and Strategies for Skin Rejuvenation.
abstract: Skin aging is a complex biological process driven by intrinsic factors, such as genetics and cellular metabolism, and extrinsic factors, including environmental stressors like UV radiation, pollution, and lifestyle choices. These factors result in visible signs of aging, such as wrinkles, reduced skin elasticity, and pigmentation.
